extendedInfo.description: Feedly is a new way to browse the content of your favorite sites, rss feeds, tumblr blogs and youtube channels. Instead of having to hunt down for information, feedly uses RSS to aggregate the contents of the news sites and blogs you like and deliver them as a fast mobile-optimized experience. Feedly is an RSS news reader re-imagined for android phones and tablets. It makes browsing faster: the content of your rss feeds and blogs are transformed into pocket-sized cards which load very fast and are easy to browse. The feedly UI is custom tailored for a 4" phone, a 7" tablet and a 10" tablet. If you run feedly on a tablet, you will get an experience which is very close to a personalized magazine: a really fun way to track and read your favorite blogs.When you run feedly on a phone and on a tablet, the configuration will automatically syncs between both devices.Feedly also offers two way sync with Google Reader: articles your read in feedly are automatically marked as read in Google Reader. Articles you save for later in feedly are automatically starred in Google Reader. RSS feeds you add to feedly are automatically added to Google Reader.Feedly makes sharing content on twitter, facebook and google+ very simple, either directly or using Buffer.We are continuously improving feedly so if you have any questions or run into an issue, you can reach as at android@feedly.com

reviews.title: Almost Perfect
reviews.comment: It\'s the best replacement for Google reader but simply missing some small ui touches on navigation compared to the chrome version to give it five stars. But otherwise perfect
reviews.author: Jansen Ng

reviews.title: Works well
reviews.comment: \"Stack scrolling\" - please implement a standard smooth one-by-one scrolling. Article title is too big and I see only 6 articles on my 5.3\'\' screen.
reviews.author: Nickolay Mazurkin

reviews.title: Great Google Reader Replacement
reviews.comment: The title kinda says it all. I actually like it better than google reader. It feels more like reading a magazine than blogs.
reviews.author: Scott Dyer

reviews.comment: Extremely useful app. Helps improve productivity manifold. One of the best easy-to-use newsreader apps out there.
reviews.author: Sandhya Chandramohan

reviews.title: Excellent News Aggregator
reviews.comment: Performs as good as it looks. With Google Reader going the way of the Dodo, Feedly will be a more than suitable replacement. My only suggestion is that it would be nice to have a way to sort the feed folders from A-Z.  UPDATE: The part few updates have made it less responsive and random restarts and freezing have become common. Hopefully the next update will fix these issues.
reviews.author: Leon Shortt

reviews.title: It\'s sleek, beautiful, and very easy to use
reviews.comment: It must be just from its look and design Google Reader\'s rich cousin. Highly recommended.
reviews.author: Jan Geronimo

reviews.title: Very good app
reviews.comment: Best Google reader replacement. Nice mobile/web apps, really fast and easy to use
reviews.author: Dragos Madarasan

reviews.title: Great RSS reader, beautiful and function packed
reviews.comment: Makes reading a delight, sharing and finding are easy, great app
reviews.author: Richard O\'Neill

reviews.title: Loving it
reviews.comment: I love the UI, eats very little battery, and has great content. I look forward to seeing more content added in the future
reviews.author: Cody Singer

reviews.title: Simply Awesome, Awesomely Simple
reviews.comment: An awesome reader with an awesome interface. You won\'t regret installing this.
reviews.author: Kris Semelka

reviews.title: Perfect!
reviews.comment: User-friendly and fast interface with plenty of customization and a gorgeous visual presentation to top it off. What more could you ask for?
reviews.author: Tobias Franz\303\251n

reviews.title: Perfect replacement for Google reader
reviews.comment: Love having my blogs all in one place.  Super user friendly.
reviews.author: Lauren Zafar

reviews.title: Beautiful AND Speedy!
reviews.comment: An incredibly beautiful and feature-packed reader, yet it manages to be butter-smooth even on my old Galaxy Nexus. Amazing work.
reviews.author: Thomas Boyko

reviews.title: Efficient, info is well presented
reviews.comment: I get the info I look for easily and on a timely basis.  Presentation of info is excellent.
reviews.author: Johann Artigas

reviews.title: PRETTY DARN GOOD
reviews.comment: Simple. Succinct. Even surprising. Feedly is great for keeping up on the world, all in one place. Would give 5 stars if there were even more to choose from.
reviews.author: kelli blue

reviews.title: Best news feed ever
reviews.comment: Easy to use, great looking and flexible. Just awsome.
reviews.author: Maciej Siwek

reviews.title: Very nice
reviews.comment: The reader looks great and is very smooth.  The only addition that would be nice is the ability to cache data so stories can be viewed without network connection after download similar to Pulse
reviews.author: Jesse Lai

reviews.title: Quick, easy, and well designed.
reviews.comment: The user interface with feedly makes rss fun. Finally a feed done right.
reviews.author: Benjamin Clark

reviews.title: A fine piece of work.
reviews.comment: Easy to use.  Easy to share articles.  Nice interface... plain and useful.
reviews.author: John Lujick

reviews.title: Best feed read ever.
reviews.comment: Fluent, functional, artistic, organized and light. I\'m. In. Love.
reviews.author: Dylan Skinner
